title: Camillo De Lellis
summary: Camillo De Lellis (born 11 June 1976) is an Italian mathematician who is active in the fields of calculus of variations, hyperbolic systems of conservation laws, geometric measure theory and fluid dynamics. He is a permanent faculty member in the School of Mathematics at the Institute for Advanced Study.[1] He is also one of the two managing editors of Inventiones Mathematicae.
